item.description:
We're planning a cookout and party on the pool deck at Gloriaâ€™s home in Windsor. Bring your suit and towel and something to share for food and/or drink and join us at 2:00 PM for swimming first, then dinner and maybe a meeting. Because this event is at a private home, you must RSVP to get directions.

Don't forget to bring your ideas for fall events, as we will be planning our September calendar at the meeting!
item.name: Pool party, cook-out, and a meeting
